modName: Smithing Tree Perks Earlier - Light_Heavy_Arcane Blacksmith
summary: The level requirement for perks in the smithing tree is lower (MUCH lower for Arcane Blacksmith). Includes an optional HARDCORE version with nerfed perks.
descriptionHtml:
The level requirement for perks in the smithing tree is lower.
Optional hardcore version with nerfed perks.
Recommended to use mods that
-change buying/selling prices
-reduce crafting materials
-My Extra Effects early mod
author: Lotus97
